newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia's NSW appoints TCorp directors.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia's NSW appoints TCorp directors.

text.p: The New South Wales government said on Monday it had appointed two new directors, Bruce Hogan and Christina Cifuentes, to the board of New South Wales Treasury Corp (TCorp), the state's public sector debt management agency.

Hogan has a long career in investment banking and is a principal of corporate and financial advisors Hogan Stokes Pty Ltd, a former joint managing director of Bankers Trust Australia and a director of Coles Myer Ltd.
Cifuentes has expertise in funds management and has worked for some time as an economic adviser in the New South Wales Treasury.
State Treasurer Michael Egan said the appointments would bring valuable financial markets experience to TCorp.
